org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot

Class CameraCalculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot.CameraCalculations

  • public class CameraCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for calculations regarding a found point. Can convert to a cartesian or polar point and return various values
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tyler Machado

      double findAngleDegrees(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
      Given a converted point, finds the angle to move that (when combined with the findDistanceToCenter) will center the target at (0,0)
      org.opencv.core.Point findCenterPoint(org.opencv.core.Point p1, org.opencv.core.Point p2)
      Given two points, finds the exact center between them
      double findDistanceToCenter(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
      Given a converted point, finds the distance to move that (when combined with the findAngleDegrees) will center the target at (0,0)
      org.opencv.core.Point findPolarPoint(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
      Given a converted point, returns the polar (r, theta) of its location relative to the center
      org.opencv.core.Point rawToScaled(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
      Given a point of the camera's native co-ords, returns a modified one with a central origin and a domain/range of [-1,1]

        Parameters:
        orig - Point given in native coordinate system
        Returns:
        scaled point

      • findDistanceToCenter

        public double findDistanceToCenter(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
        Given a converted point, finds the distance to move that (when combined with the findAngleDegrees) will center the target at (0,0)
        Parameters:
        orig - Converted point to find distance from center
        Returns:
        distance from center in scaled system

      • findAngleDegrees

        public double findAngleDegrees(org.opencv.core.Point orig)
        Given a converted point, finds the angle to move that (when combined with the findDistanceToCenter) will center the target at (0,0)
        Parameters:
        orig - Converted point to find phi of
        Returns:
        Angle offset in degrees

      • findPolarPoint

        public org.opencv.core.Point findPolarPoint(org.opencv.core.Point orig)

        Parameters:
        orig - Converted point to find polar coordinate of
        Returns:
        Polar point

        Given two points, finds the exact center between them
        Parameters:
        p1 - First reference point
        p2 - Second reference point
        Returns:
